bounceBallTooltip: Bounce a ball off of an object.
finalLevel: Urime! Ju keni perfunduar enigmen perfundimatare.
ifTooltip: Nese ka vend ne nje drejtim te caktuar, atehere bej nje veprim te caktuar.
ifelseTooltip: Nese eshte nje rruge ne drejtimin e caktuar, atehere bej veprimet e grupit te pare. Perndryshe, bej veprimet e grupit te dyte.
isWallTooltip: Returns true if there is a wall here
moveLeftTooltip: Move the paddle to the left.
moveRightTooltip: Move the paddle to the right.
nextLevel: Urime! Ju keni perfunduar kete enigme.
noPathLeft: nuk ka hapesire ne te majte
noPathRight: nuk ka hapesire ne te djathte
numBlocksNeeded: Kjo enigme mund te zgjidhet me %1 rreshta.
oneTopBlock: Per kete enigme, ju duhet te mblidhni se bashku te gjitha rreshtat ne nje hapesire pune te bardhe te paster.
pathLeft: nese ka rruge ne te majte
pathRight: nese ka rruge ne te djathte
turnTooltip: Te kthen majtas ose djathtas prej 90 gradesh.
whenDownTooltip: Execute the actions below when the Down arrow button is pressed.
whenLeftTooltip: Execute the actions below when the Left arrow button is pressed.
whenPaddleCollidedTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball collides with a paddle.
whenRightTooltip: Execute the actions below when the Right arrow button is pressed.
whenUpTooltip: Execute the actions below when the Up arrow button is pressed.
whenWallCollidedTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball collides with a wall.
whileTooltip: Perserit veprimet e brendshme derisa pika e mbarimit arritet.
